featureBenefits.headline: 24.3MP APS-C CMOS sensor with gapless on-chip lens design
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Upgraded Exmor™ CMOS Sensor enhances sensitivity and reduces noise by filling gaps between on-chip lenses. Sensor offers 20% higher sensitivity than the previous model.

featureBenefits.headline: BIONZ X™ processor
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Enhanced processing engine handles enormous amounts of sensor data to allow very high-speed shooting of superb, low-noise images.

featureBenefits.headline: 79-point phase-detection AF system
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Newly developed AF system with 15 cross sensors for accurate, non-stop autofocusing - effective with Viewfinder or live view on LCD.

featureBenefits.headline: Quick AF Full HD movie
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Shoot 1920 x 1080 video with full-time AF tracking of moving subjects: now with 60p/24p progressive shooting for cinematic results.

featureBenefits.headline: Proprietary Translucent Mirror Technology
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Sony’s unique design replaces a DSLR moving mirror with a fixed translucent mirror, which enables ultra-fast shooting with continuous use of accurate phase detection AF.

featureBenefits.headline: 12 fps with AF tracking
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Capture fast-moving action with razor-sharp tracking, at up to 12 fps (approx. maximum speed with Continuous AF mode). Shoot 60 frames per burst, when quality set to ‘FINE’ and image size set to ‘L.’

featureBenefits.headline: AF Range Control
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Locks autofocusing to a specified range of distance from the camera for sharp results, even if the target is obscured momentarily by another passing object.

featureBenefits.headline: Wide sensitivity range from ISO 100-25600
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: High maximum sensitivity allows natural, low-noise images, even in low light: expansion mode extends sensitivity down to ISO 50.

featureBenefits.headline: Creative Full HD movie functions
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Enjoy sharp, accurate autofocusing with full-time AF; P/A/S/M exposure modes offer total creative control.

featureBenefits.headline: XGA OLED TruFinder™
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Precision electronic viewfinder with high contrast and 100% frame coverage for accurate framing, focusing and shot review.

featureBenefits.headline: High-resolution information display
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Select from a choice of Graphic Display, Display All Info, No Disp. Info, Histogram or Digital Level Gauge display options.

featureBenefits.headline: 7.5 cm (3.0-type) Tiltable LCD screen
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Freely-adjustable high resolution (1,228000 dot) LCD with WhiteMagic technology for clear viewing, even under direct sunlight.

featureBenefits.headline: Face Detection with Face Registration
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Recognises up to 8 faces in a scene, optimising optimum exposure, white balance, flash and other settings for beautiful portraits.

featureBenefits.headline: Expanded Flexible Spot
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: If the active AF point begins to lose track of your subject, one of 8 surrounding AF points instantly activates for continuous, accurate tracking of your moving subject.

featureBenefits.headline: Clear Image Zoom
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Digitally zooms centre portion of image up to 2x with nearly imperceptible degradation, virtually doubling your zooming range.

featureBenefits.headline: 5-step tracking adjustment
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: AF tracking duration is adjustable in 5 steps, with low settings prioritising stability and high settings prioritising speed (ideal when shooting various subjects at different distances, for example). Three settings are also available when shooting movies.

featureBenefits.headline: Eye AF
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Captures faces in sharp focus, even when your subject is partially turned away from the camera with a shallow depth of field.

featureBenefits.headline: Enhanced AF area modes
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Lock-on AF, which optimises target frame size and ensures use of the optimal AF point, is now available as a focus area mode. You can choose the initial AF point for tracking from the Wide, Zone, Centre, Flexible Spot or Expanded Flexible Spot AF area mode.

featureBenefits.headline: Enhanced in-body image stabilisation
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Effective image stabilisation for any compatible lens, throughout the entire focal length range. Helps stabilise the viewfinder image while the shutter button is halfway pressed.

featureBenefits.headline: BIONZ X™ processing engine
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: The enhanced processor handles enormous amounts of sensor data to allow high-speed shooting of superb low-noise images. Advanced built-in features include detail reproduction technology to produce more realistic images, diffraction-reduction to correct blurred details, and area-specific noise reduction for clearer, more finely detailed images even at high ISO settings. Area-specific noise selectively divides the image into areas based on patterns (such as edges, textures and evenly coloured-areas like blue skies), then applies the most appropriate noise reduction for each area.

featureBenefits.headline: Customisable function buttons
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Assign frequently used functions to the customisable buttons of your choice. Easily reassign 11 buttons to activate any of 53 functions for speedier, more intuitive operation.

featureBenefits.headline: Focus Magnifier and Peaking function
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Magnify your image or movie in the high-resolution viewfinder for manual fine-tuning of the focus, or use Peaking to colourise the most sharply-focused areas of your image for quick confirmation.

featureBenefits.headline: Adjustable viewfinder settings
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: To compensate for the type and amount of light in your surroundings, adjust the viewfinder colour temperature and brightness in 5 simple steps.

featureBenefits.headline: Capture One Express (for Sony)
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Capture One Express (for Sony) is one of the world's best RAW converters, rendering precise colours and incredible detail. It contains flexible digital asset management, all the essential adjustment tools and fast, responsive performance in one customisable and integrated solution. * Please contact Phase One regarding all inquiries as to usage and support including functional compatibility of Capture One Express (for Sony).
